Title: Functional (psychogenic) dystonia
Abstract: © Springer-Verlag Wien 2015.Functional (psychogenic) neurological disorders are common throughout neurological practice, and functional movement disorders (FMDs) form a considerable proportion of these cases. In this chapter, we will consider the entity of functional (psychogenic) dystonia.
